component.name: Verium Vault
component.summary: Connect to the Verium P2P Network

description.p: Verium is an experimental digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. Verium uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Verium is the name of open source software which enables the use of this currency.
Verium is designed to be ASIC / GPU Resistant and is the first CPU mineable digital commoditt.
Verium is part of the Vericonomy opensource and decentralized organisation.
